Namespace Hasher


Extends MM.EventDispatcher.
History Manager for rich-media applications.
Defined in: Hasher-0.9.5.js.

Namespace Detail
Hasher
Hasher
Method Detail
<static> Hasher.back()
Navigate to previous page in history
<static> Hasher.dispose()
Removes all event listeners, stops Hasher and destroy Hasher object. - IMPORTANT: Hasher won't work after calling this method, Hasher Object will be deleted. - automatically called on `window.onunload`.
<static> Hasher.forward()
Navigate to next page in history
<static> {string} Hasher.getBaseURL()
Retrieve URL without query string and hash.
Returns:
{string} Base URL.
<static> {string} Hasher.getHash()
Return hash value as String.
Returns:
{string} Hash value without '#'.
<static> {Array.} Hasher.getHashAsArray(separator)
Return hash value as Array.
Parameters:
{string} separator Optional
String used to divide hash (default = '/').
Returns:
{Array.} Hash splitted into an Array.
<static> {string} Hasher.getHashQuery()
Get Query portion of the Hash as a String - alias to: `MM.queryUtils.getQueryString( Hasher.getHash() ).substr(1);`
Returns:
{string} Hash Query without '?'
<static> {Object} Hasher.getHashQueryAsObject()
Get Query portion of the Hash as an Object - alias to: `MM.queryUtils.toQueryObject( Hasher.getHashQueryString() );`
Returns:
{Object} Hash Query
<static> {string} Hasher.getHashQueryParam(paramName)
Get parameter value from the query portion of the Hash - alias to: `MM.queryUtils.getParamValue(paramName, Hasher.getHash() );`
Parameters:
{string} paramName
Parameter Name.
Returns:
{string} Parameter value.
<static> {string} Hasher.getTitle()
Get page title
Returns:
{string} Page Title
<static> {string} Hasher.getURL()
Retrieve full URL.
Returns:
{string} Full URL.
<static> Hasher.go(delta)
Loads a page from the session history, identified by its relative location to the current page. - for example `-1` loads previous page, `1` loads next page.
Parameters:
{int} delta
Relative location to the current page.
<static> Hasher.init()
Start listening/dispatching changes in the hash/history.
<static> Hasher.setHash(value)
Set Hash value.
Parameters:
{string} value
Hash value without '#'.
<static> Hasher.setTitle(value)
Set page title
Parameters:
{string} value
Page Title
<static> Hasher.stop()
Stop listening/dispatching changes in the hash/history.
